Control.ttp: This page provides information related to Security Settings.
The name this user provides for logging into the PAC.
When checkmarked, indicates a password is not required for this user to login to the PAC.
The password this user provides for logging into the PAC.
The password this user provides for logging into the PAC which must match the 'New Password' above.
Indicates this user can login to the database when it contains a checkmark.
The date and time this user was orignally added to the database.
The date and time this user was last modified.
Indicates the level of access granted to this user.
Displays online help related to this page when clicked.
Sets this page into [Add User] mode allowing data related to a new user to be added.
Sets this page into [Remove User] mode affectively deleting this user from the database when the 'Save' button is clicked.
Saves the current information pertaining to this user to the database.
Refresh the contents of this page.
Collapses all the groups displayed in the grid.
Expands all the groups displayed in the grid.
The name the user provides for logging into the PAC.
Indicates the level of access granted to this user.
The date and time the user was orignally added to the database.
The date and time the user was last modified.
Indicates the user can login to the database when it contains a checkmark.
The date and time the user last accessed the database via the corresponding IP Address.
The IP Address(es) the user accessed the database from.

Messages.Message: Password must be at least {0} characters in length.
Username must be at least {0} characters in length.
